Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 6
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty VI; sheet 1; Hieratic text recto: medical treatise. Recto 1-6.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, p. 53-4. Vol. 2 Plate 30, Recto 1-5; Plates 31 & 31A, Recto 6. (Recto = Medical Prescriptions.)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381083) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381083)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2009 May-Jan 2024, Newcastle, Great North Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss, fragmentary, bloom Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk: Checked for loan to Newcastle 2009 (2006) Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: filmoplast t self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
